attributes.action: Sack all MPs (including the PM) who flouted covid lockdown rules
attributes.additional_details:
MPs need to show some respect and practice what they preach. 
It was do as I say,  not as I do.  
I’m absolutely disgusted that some ‘partied’ in secret while others couldn’t go and see their dying relatives.
attributes.background: Sack every MP who flouted lockdown rules.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
